title: Nosferatu

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- When performing the factional bite, transform into a bat to make your action astral
- Otherwise, you may drink blood from a player at night, roleblocking them

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - You cannot be killed by conventional means. Only a stake to your heart may permanently put an end to you. Only vampire hunters and vampire hunter adjacent roles are able to kill you

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Make man pay for their crimes against the natural order.
